articles.title: Delegation of Special Envoy of S. Korean President to Visit Pyongyang
articles.content:
Delegation of Special Envoy of S. Korean President to Visit Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- A delegation of special envoy of the south Korean president with Jong Ui Yong, chief of the State Security Office of Chongwadae, as special envoy will soon visit Pyongyang.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Guinea
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Guinea
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Alpha Conde, president of Guinea, on his 80th birthday.
					 The message wished the Guinean president good health and happiness and success in the work for building prosperous Guinea.

articles.title: Japanese Right-wing Gangsters' Terrorism Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
Japanese Right-wing Gangsters' Terrorism Denounced in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- More than 40 civic and social organizations of south Korea including the Solidarity for Achieving People's Rights, the Confederation of Trade Unions and the General Federation of Peasant Associations released a joint statement on Feb. 28 in denunciation of the Japanese right-wing gangsters' shooting spree against the Central Hall of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 Accusing the Japanese government of persisting in the policy hostile to the DPRK and the policy of discrimination against the Japan-resident Koreans, the statement urged it to thoroughly probe the truth behind the shooting spree case and severely punish the criminals.

articles.title: Fishing Boats Collision in S. Korea
articles.content:
Fishing Boat Collision in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- A fishing boat collision in the waters off Thongyong City, South Kyongsang Province of south Korea left one dead and one wounded on Thursday, according to MBC of south Korea.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Feats Held Abroad
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Feats Held Abroad
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the feats of leader Kim Jong Il took place in Mongolia, Nepal, Indonesia, Pakistan, Thailand and Kuwait on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 The general secretary of the C.C., Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist) said it is one of leader Kim Jong Il's feats that he firmly defended socialist Korea at the time when the moves of the imperialist allied forces to isolate and stifle the DPRK reached their height. Today's DPRK would have been unthinkable without his Songun politics and that's why the progressive mankind is highly praising his Songun feats, he added.
					
					 The secretary general of the Karachi Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association praised the exploits of Kim Jong Il, who made a great contribution to the building of socialism and the accomplishment of the world cause of independence with his distinguished ideological and theoretical wisdom and energetic leadership.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un were adopted at the seminars in Nepal.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The Arton Publishing House of Russia brought out in booklet respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies that it is the principled requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of the Korean revolution to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). It indicates the tasks for steadily strengthening the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on Feb. 13.

articles.title: Resolution of Solidarity with DPRK Adopted
articles.content:
Resolution of Solidarity with DPRK Adopted
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- A solidarity resolution on the DPRK was adopted at the meeting of the Presidential Council of the World Federation of Trade Unions in Iran on Feb. 27.
					 The participants in the meeting express deep concern over the U.S. straining the situation in the Korean peninsula and its vicinity while running frantically to provoke a nuclear war that will stamp out the Korean nation, block its reunification and wreck peace and security of the peninsula and the region, the resolution said.
					
					 Branding the U.S. as the main obstacle to the improvement of inter-Korean relations and Korea's reunification, the root cause of all misfortune and pains suffered by the Korean nation and the chief wrecker of peace and stability on the Korean peninsula, it said:
					
					 The WFTU strongly urges the U.S. to properly face up to the trend of the times and the reality, roll back its anachronistic hostile policy towards the DPRK and come out to conclude a peace accord with the DPRK as early as possible.
					
					 We demand that the U.S. put a complete end to the U.S.-led joint military exercises, the root cause of escalating tension on the peninsula, withdraw its troops and nuclear war hardware from south Korea and immediately stop the illegal sanctions and pressure on the DPRK.
					
					 The WFTU ardently appeals to all its member organizations and friendly bodies to extend firm solidarity to the working class and other working people of the DPRK in the struggle for glorifying the 70th birthday of the DPRK as a grand festival of victors by winning a fresh victory on all fronts of building a powerful socialist country through a revolutionary general offensive.

articles.title: La delegacion del enviado especial del presidente surcoreano visitara a Pyongyang
articles.content:
La delegacion del enviado especial del presidente surcoreano visitara a Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ACNC) -- Visitara pronto a esta capital la delegacion del enviado especial del presidente surcoreano. 
					El enviado especial es Jong Ui Yong, jefe de la Oficina de Seguridad Nacional de Chongwadae.

articles.title: Luchador coreano obtiene medalla de oro en campeonato asiatico
articles.content:
Luchador coreano obtiene medalla de oro en campeonato asiatico
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ACNC) -- Kang Kum Song, luchador coreano sobresalio en el Campeonato Asiatico de Lucha de 2018.
					En la categoria de 57kg de lucha libre masculino, Kang vencio a su rival surcoreano en el cuarto de final y al japones en la semifinal.
					
					En la final efectuada el dia 3, el luchador coreano doblego al jugador de Uzbekistan, asi que gano la medalla de oro.
